reviewText: I love my DVD double feature of "She Devil" and "War of the Rose". They are both great movies and I was excited to get them both for one price. The DVD's play well and the case was in great condition.
These movies were great to watch when we thinking about a divorce. The extremes some people will go to is crazy! Definitely a lighter look at the issues of splitting up.

I was so happy to get both of these movies together, as both are so funny and full of entertainment! What a deal to get both together. I think all couples and singles will enjoy both of the movies. I can not believe that there are not many reviews. All I know is that we laughed and laughed. Lessons can be learned from both movies. It is just all good fun.

Get them both together, better deal and great classics to add to your collection!

Enjoy!
Very happy with my purchase arrived on time and no problem
Love both of thes movies. I was excited to find them both on one disc. Disc came promptly and works like a charm.
Quick delivery happy with purchase, Thank you

Both movies in this set are good. I have been trying to get She-Devil for a few years now, and it being out of print made finding a copy that didn't cost an arm and a leg near impossible. I already owned The War of the Roses, but getting this two movie set was cheaper than buying just She-Devil by itself. It's worth buying if you are looking for just one or both of these films. The price was right and I received it much earlier than I was told I would. That made me extremely happy. I highly recommend buying this for your collection.
I love She-Devil. I never watched WofR though.

This movie is one of my favorite.  The casting for this movie is just great and all of the actors did a great job with bringing this story to the screen.  Everyone loves to see the underdog win and this movie delivers.
